name: Bricks AI

shortDescription: Bricks AI revolutionizes the creation of admin panels by automating the process. It transforms your API into a fully-configured admin panel in seconds, updating automatically with any changes to your APIs. Ideal for developers and CTOs tired of the manual effort involved in building and maintaining internal tools, Bricks AI offers a seamless, no-code solution. Imagine deploying an admin panel without writing a single line of code, saving valuable engineering time and enhancing productivity.
cons: May not support all API types
